alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued September 26 at 4:04PM EDT until September 28 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. For the Coastal Flood Watch, one to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Surry, James City, Isle of Wight Counties, and Newport News. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 2 AM EDT Wednesday. For the Coastal Flood Watch, from Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Some roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/10 PM 4.2 2.0 1.7 1 MINOR 27/10 AM 4.6 2.4 2.3 1 MODERATE 27/11 PM 4.7 2.5 2.2 1 MODERATE 28/11 AM 4.5 2.3 2.1 1 MODERATE 29/12 AM 4.4 2.2 2.0 1 MINOR 29/12 PM 4.4 2.2 1.8 1 MINOR SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/08 PM 5.1 2.3 2.0 3 MINOR 27/08 AM 5.6 2.8 2.6 3 MODERATE 27/08 PM 5.6 2.8 2.4 3 MODERATE 28/09 AM 5.2 2.4 2.0 3 MINOR 28/09 PM 5.2 2.4 2.0 3 MINOR 29/10 AM 5.3 2.5 1.9 2-3 MINOR FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/08 PM 5.1 2.3 1.9 3 MINOR 27/08 AM 5.5 2.7 2.5 3 MODERATE 27/08 PM 5.6 2.8 2.3 3 MODERATE 28/09 AM 5.3 2.5 2.0 3 MINOR 28/09 PM 5.3 2.5 2.0 3 MINOR 29/10 AM 5.3 2.5 1.8 2-3 MINOR &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
